QuickJump - Quick jump to tiddlers in story list

!!!Features

# Add " <<QuickJump>> " button to bring a popup menu to ''jump to tiddlers in story list'' -- emulate the function of ` Open tab ` ( [[$:/core/ui/SideBar/Open]] @sidebar )
# After jumping
#* Keep  popup menu on top, or
#* Auto close the popup
# Technical
#* Practice `<$linkcatcher>` widget

!!!Install
* Drag&Drop -- [[$:/plugins/eucaly/quickjump]] (with documentation)

!!!Uasge
# Create a new tiddler that contains `<<QuickJump>>` macro call
# Add {{$:/tags/TopRightBar||$:/core/ui/TagTemplate}} tag to the tiddler
# If necessary, tweak [[$:/plugins/eucaly/quickjump/StyleSheet]]
# Possible for other locations, such as {{$:/tags/TopLeftBar||$:/core/ui/TagTemplate}} {{$:/tags/PageControls||$:/core/ui/TagTemplate}} {{$:/tags/ViewToolbar||$:/core/ui/TagTemplate}} or  [[$:/SiteSubtitle]]. While, might need to tweak:
#* ~StyleSheet as mentioned above
#* [[Popup position|http://tiddlywiki.com/#RevealWidget]] (other than ''belowleft'') in [[$:/plugins/eucaly/quickjump/macros]]
